name: Ho Chi Minh City
fun_fact: Fun fact: Ho Chi Minh City (formerly Saigon) has over 9 million motorbikes for 9 million people - the city flows like a river of scooters. Crossing the street is an art form: walk slowly and steadily, and traffic will flow around you like water around a rock!
